messages.msg: Welcome to our site! If you are looking for prayer or someone to chat with, reply to this message or email us at prayer@fightlust.com
Looking for release from a demonic will and I want to release myself from harlotry lust fornication adultery pornography and evil thoughts

We're here to support you in your journey towards healing. You can pray for release from these struggles by renouncing the spirits of harlotry, lust, fornication, adultery, pornography, and evil thoughts. 

Here's a prayer you can use: 

"Heavenly Father, I come before you today and renounce all sexual sins that I have been involved in, including fornication, masturbation, pornography, perversion, and adultery. In the name of Jesus Christ, I break all curses of adultery, perversion, fornication, and lust. I command all spirits of lust and perversion to come out of my life right now. I present my body to you as a living sacrifice and ask for your strength to walk in purity."

If you need further guidance or support, feel free to ask!
I also want to be able to loose the guilt and shame that comes along with those sins and ask God to release me from any innocent person that I may have caused to sin because of my sins

It's important to seek healing from guilt and shame. You can pray for God's forgiveness and release from these burdens. Here's a prayer you might find helpful:

"Lord, I ask for your forgiveness for the sins I have committed and for any innocent person I may have caused to stumble because of my actions. Please cleanse me from all guilt and shame. Help me to accept your grace and to walk in the freedom that comes from your forgiveness. I release all burdens of guilt and shame to you, trusting in your mercy and love."

If you need more support or resources, just let me know!
I want my marriage cleansed from all sexual sin that I was involved in and restored I ask for a holy marriage and to be a holy husband

It's wonderful that you desire to cleanse your marriage and seek restoration. You can pray for your marriage to be renewed and for God's guidance in becoming a holy husband. Here’s a prayer you can use:

"Heavenly Father, I come before you asking for the cleansing of my marriage from all sexual sin that I have been involved in. I pray for restoration and healing in our relationship. Help me to be a holy husband, committed to purity and love. Fill our marriage with your Spirit and guide us in living according to your will. I trust in your power to transform our lives and our relationship."

If you need further assistance or resources, feel free to reach out!
I want continued prayer and accountability

It's great that you're seeking continued prayer and accountability! We can definitely support you in that. You might consider sharing your prayer requests with us so we can pray for you regularly. Additionally, if you're interested in joining a support group, that can provide you with the accountability you’re looking for.

Would you like to share a specific prayer request, or do you want more information on how to connect with a support group?

Thank you for your response! Please feel free to share your specific prayer request, and I'll make sure to pray for you. If you're also interested in information about support groups, let me know, and I can provide that as well!
Yes support groups and continued prayer

Absolutely! For continued prayer, please share any specific requests you have, and we'll be sure to pray for you.

Regarding support groups, we can help you connect with others who are on a similar journey. These groups provide a safe space for sharing experiences and receiving encouragement. If you’d like, I can guide you on how to get involved with a support group. Just let me know!

Great! To get involved with a support group, you can reach out to us directly through our website or contact our ministry team. They can provide you with information on available groups, meeting times, and how to join.

If you have any specific preferences or questions about the support groups, feel free to ask! We're here to help you on your journey towards healing and accountability.
How do I get involved in the support groups?

To get involved in the support groups, you can visit our website and look for the section dedicated to support groups or contact our ministry team directly. They will provide you with all the necessary information about available groups, meeting times, and how to join.

If you need any assistance navigating the site or have further questions, just let me know! I'm here to help.
Thank you and please keep me in prayer I really want my marriage bed restored to purity and the defilement cleansed and forgiven

You're very welcome! We will definitely keep you in our prayers for the restoration of your marriage bed to purity and for the cleansing and forgiveness you seek. 

If you have any specific prayer requests or additional thoughts you'd like to share, please feel free to do so. We're here to support you in this journey!
